description: Laundromat from the Speedqueen chain. Very clean and 10 minutes walk from the motorhome area (on the other side of the park). There is even a machine and a dryer reserved for animals.

title: (14004) Córdoba - A-431
description:
Parking and service area with a steep incline. 20-30 minutes walk from the world famous Mesquita and 10 minutes walk from the historic center. Super central with a large, beautiful park just above (good for joggers and dog walkers). Jacks can compensate for the gradient. Balancing with wedges is much more difficult.
The first 10 minutes are free. After that, every minute is billed. Payment is by credit card.
There is no electricity on the pitches. There is an emergency power connection at the disposal station
Danger:
1) Not suitable for vehicles over 8.50 m.
2) The place is parceled out. If you use more than one plot, you pay twice! (Furniture, trailer or wrong parking). Pay attention to the boundaries of the parcel.
3) After paying, you have 5 minutes to leave. After that you have to pay !

title: (14009) Córdoba - 1 Plaza Tejar
description: Parking next to the Guadalquivir river, with a children's park next to the river, a Roman bridge and a Cordoba mosque 5 minutes away on foot.

title: (14009) Córdoba - 33 Calle Segunda de Miraflores
description: OK for one night, the location is great. We have a dog with us and were able to go for a great walk in the morning right by the river. The parking lot is fenced and quiet.

During the day it is controlled by an association for the disabled who give you a ticket for one euro and spend the day. Very quiet and without problems to just sleep and visit the beautiful city of Cordoba. MANY THANKS TO THE LOCAL POLICE OF CORDOBA FOR THEIR HELP.

Parking spaces with electricity and water
Squares with water and emptying
Central squares with services


Parking for motorhomes and campers, located on a large plot in a quiet area perfect for resting, visiting Córdoba and Medina Azahara (since we are only 1.6 km from the archaeological complex) You have a bakery/cafeteria open every day, a 200m2 bus stop directly to the city center, cycle path and supermarkets open from Monday to Sunday. Reservations are not allowed and it is not necessary to notify your arrival. SEE INFORMATION UPON YOUR ARRIVAL IN THE OFFICE WINDOW.

Next to the shopping center, cinema, bowling alley and gas stations, about 300 meters from the city center and next to the bike path. Visit its old town, bridge, Alianza, Fuente Álamo and its lighting at Christmas. The city of Light, where the Sun becomes sweet.

title_short: (14720) Almodóvar del Río - 10 Calle las Acacias

There is space for 4 or 5 motorhomes that are not very large since it is narrow. If the car is big, better park downstairs because you won't be able to park it if there are more cars parked

title: (14500) Puente Genil - 13 Calle Montalbán

Ideal to walk through its streets, see the spectacular lighting of the "city of light", visit its Christmas market (Parque de los Pinos). Quiet area to sleep. Puente Genil, where "the sun becomes sweet". At the foot of the bike path, ideal for a walk with children. Although it has no connection with the oil greenway (for this, go to the old Campo Real station). Without services, possibility of toilets in supermarket.

Only daytime castle opening, otherwise closed with a chain

Beside you have fixed tables. No other services because the water point does not work anymore. A house next door but quiet. The other hermits, including the one opposite, are to be visited with a walk except the one just before arriving and practically opposite a viewpoint overlooking Cordoba.

title: () Córdoba -
description: This is near to the other “place in nature” marked on the map already, but if you have 4x4 continue on from the Church parking down into bottom of small valley and follow GPS for a few minutes up tricky track which requires 4x4 and good ground clearance. Spot is on ridge on edge of valley, great views, just pulled off track, very peaceful. One walker around 9am. View back to Church and across surrounding hills. Only 20 mins to central Cordoba- we used for two nights, no one there.

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río - CP-159

It has bathrooms during working hours, if the operator is already out, they remain closed. Just opposite is the Children's City, which is a very well set up park for children, it's great.

Very quiet night and a wake alone in the world with a great view of the lake. Regarding the services, just a beach shower going down on foot to the lake.

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río - Unnamed Road

Location in the heart of the hills, with a view of the lake and the sunset, passage of sheep with their shepherd. To advice !

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río - Unnamed Road

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

title: (14029) Córdoba - CO-3408

No services, but recreational area and picnic nearby. And a small playground. A discovery. Forbidden at night

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

name: Camping Los Villares Sierra de Córdoba
title: (14029) Camping Los Villares Sierra de Córdoba
title_short: (14029) Camping Los Villares Sierra de Córdoba

title: (14940) Cabra - 4 Avenida González Meneses

Perhaps for large vehicles the entrance is not as good as it should be, but for Camper it is ideal. The RV park was packed and we found this. There is a Lidl and a Mercadona nearby, a sports pavilion nearby with services and a laundry opposite the pavilion.

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

title: (14940) Cabra -
description: Very modern laundry. The machines even have a multilingual menu. Has a machine where you can change banknotes into coins.

title: (14860) Doña Mencía - CO-6202

title_short: (14850) Baena - 30 Calle Demetrio de los Ríos

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -
description: Very quiet place on the way to the campsite. The terrain is not flat everywhere but there is a good place for a 7.5m camper or 2-3 smaller campers. Part lake view. Environment not completely clean, but if everyone takes some garbage with them, it will be an even more beautiful place. Now and then you can hear the spitting of water from the dam. The road along the place is very quiet. No facilities available. 4G reception. we picked up 3 bags of garbage and took them with us. Hopefully it stays orderly now because it's a nice place. at night we also heard a wild boar rooting.

title: (14900) Lucena - 5D Ronda de San Francisco
description: Public laundry, from the Speed queen franchise.

name: Area Autocaravanas
title: (14860) Area Autocaravanas
description: Municipal area for motorhomes. Along the via verde del aceite cycle path, on the site of the former Estacion Doña Mencia railway station. Paid parking. Different price for one night during the week, or for the weekend, or for a week. Payment at the tourist office, no later than the day after arrival. Reservation required: Free services if the entrance barrier is open. Restaurant on site, La Cantina.

title: (41400) Écija - 5A Calle Málaga
description: It is an unpaved place. Without care. It is about a 15-minute walk from the center. There is a school across the street. Today is Saturday and the place is almost empty. It may be different on school days.

title: (14029) Córdoba - CH-1

title: (14029) Córdoba - CH-1
description: Nice spot around the dam. Easy access by a dirt road frequented by fishermen. At the end of April, the water is at 21 °. We had a bath. We preferred to leave access to the water's edge to fishermen. Several places are possible for a van. Nice site to leave cleaner after your departure.

title: (14029) Córdoba - CO-3408
description: Parking lot in a great location for hiking. There are wells with water although there is no drain water. There are plenty of picnic and BBQ tables with garbage disposal. There is also a restaurant-bar nearby with a children's playground.

title: (41400) Écija - Autovía del Sur
description: Public parking and free near the highway, easy access without service. Perfect for the night.

name: Camping la Brena.

description: Superb view overlooking the lake, friendly welcome, restaurant on site.

title: (14350) Cerro Muriano -
description: Under a hermitage, pure nature, many trees that provide shade, for 1 or 2 nights, do not start a forest fire! Very dry here. In the town of Cerro Muriano they still bought food in the "native" market. I stayed here from Cáceres to Córdoba. The photo with a view is at the top of Eremita - doable with a maximum of 6 m mobile homes/vans and it is possible to turn around - to the location here 200 m below up to 7.50 m mobile home. No 4x4 needed. Some motorcyclists go through until 8 p.m. m., just move back.

title: (41400) Écija - 11 Avenida del Ferrocarril
